title: I-820 photos
text: 2015 update: All these photos are obsolete due to construction of the North Tarrant Express toll lanes on this section, completed in 2014. These photos show the original freeway.

imageStatus.note: This section of Loop 820 was rebuilt and four toll lanes were added by the North Tarrant Express project, completed in 2014.

images.caption: Approaching the northeast corner of I-820 and the interchange with TX 121 and TX 183

imageStatus.note: This section of Loop 820 was rebuilt and four toll lanes were added by the North Tarrant Express project, completed in 2014.

images.caption: Just ahead the freeway becomes much wider with new concrete. The interchange at TX 121 and TX 121 was totally rebuilt and expanded in a project that completed around 2002.

This interchange was substantially modified by the North Tarrant Express project, completed in 2014. Long elevated structures were added for the managed lanes.
